Glamdring.description:
Glamdring is an Elven-Made Hand-And-A-Half Sword (declare its use as a Single-Handed or Two-Handed weapon before the start of a Fight).

Additionally, Glamdring increases Gandalf's Strength by 1 when making strikes with it.

Narya.description: Gandalf may re-roll his dice when making Fate rolls.

Noldorin Dagger.description: A Noldorin Dagger is a Single-Handed weapon that can be used as a Throwing Weapon (Range 6" & Strength 3). The model making strikes (combat or thrown) with this weapon may re-roll failed To Wound rolls.
